title: Braun Satin Hair - How to style with SensoCare "Sexy waves"
description:
Want to learn how to create iconic hair styles with Braun straightener? With Braun SensoCare straightener you can create most trendy hair styles and protect your hair from damage. 
Braun SensoCare - feels hair, adapts temperature for ultimate heat protect

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Want to learn how to create iconic hair styles with Braun straightener? With Braun SensoCare straightener you can create most trendy hair styles and protect your hair from damage. 
Braun SensoCare - feels hair, adapts temperature for ultimate heat protection.

Check out the how to create "Iconic Waves" style with SensoCare http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TTxbd4hfqRU
Check out the how to create "Paris chic" style with SensoCarehttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u_8Bje7bt9Q
Check out the how to create "Up and down" style with SensoCare http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=51GHPsVeVJU

Check out how to epilate with Braun Silk-epil epilators http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=339UTr6FL4s
